participant_1.background:
My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.
i like to try different beers from various countries.
I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.

participant_2.background:
I feel the most confident when I'm wearing makeup and listening to Charlie Daniels.
I can remember listening to my parents' Beatles record over and over again.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
my parents both are school teachers.
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.

content.text: Not bad. How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm a mixed-race Chinese-American and I'm a vegetarian. I love to try different beers from various countries. Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I'm single and I enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art. I also love listening to Charlie Daniels and wearing makeup. What's your favorite thing about your heritage?
I love the food and the culture. I grew up eating a lot of Chinese food and I still love it. I also love the way the Chinese people value family. What's your favorite thing about being single?
I love the freedom to do whatever I want and not have to worry about anyone else. I also love being able to focus on my art without having to worry about anyone else's needs.
That sounds really nice. I love being able to do what I want when I want, but I do miss having someone to share my life with.
I can understand that. It's definitely nice to have someone to share your life with.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Yes, I'm going to be spending the weekend working on my art. I'm trying to finish a painting by the end of the weekend.
That sounds like fun. I'm going to be spending the weekend with my kids. We're going to go to the zoo and the beach.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I hope you have a great time.
